RelatedSentence: China is willing to work hand in hand with Portugal to promote a new phase in two - way relations , China 's President , Xi Jinping said Thursday in Beijing .
China is willing to work hand in hand with Portugal to promote a new phase in two - way relations , China 's President , Xi Jinping said Thursday in Beijing .

Cavaco Silva arrived in China last Monday for a week - long visit at the invitation of his Chinese counterpart , and before arriving in Beijing he visited Shanghai and is due to travel to Macau at the weekend before returning to Portugal .
